column5: Urban community is located in the heart of Alamo Heights, moments away from shopping, eateries, art galleries and more. If you're searching for a stay in central San Antonio. This place offers sophisticated comfort: luxury finishes, and top of the line amenities. Entertain in our outdoor living space: a fully equipped outdoor kitchen, fire pit, resort pool, and dog park. Enjoy our state of the art fitness center, or relax in your well appointed spacious apartment.
